Request.name: LCM Requester Notification

EmailTemplate.name: LCM Requester Notification
EmailTemplate.Body:
The following changes you requested for identity 'Krishna Nair' were APPROVED.
Application: Financial Planning & Forecasting Account : 8512510 Operation: Add Attribute: roles Value(s): Reconciliation Analyst
Application: Financial Planning & Forecasting Account : 8512510 Operation: Add Attribute: roles Value(s): Treasury Specialist
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying requesters when their employee's account(s) are modified. Note that in addition to the declared arguments, all workflow variables, Step arguments, and Approval arguments defined in the Workflow are also available.

Argument.name: approvalSet
Argument.Description: The ApprovalSet object contained in the workflow.

Argument.name: launcher
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that launched the workflow.

Argument.name: identityDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that is being changed.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Account changes you requested for Krishna Nair were processed
